displayName.portuguese: Desejo Em Cima De Uma Estrela

description.english: Touch a Fallen Star for the first time
description.french: Touchez une étoile tombée pour la première fois
description.german: Berühre zum ersten Mal einen gefallenen Stern
description.italian: Toccare una stella caduta per la prima volta
description.polish: Dotknij upadła gwiazda po raz pierwszy
description.portuguese: Toque em uma estrela caída, pela primeira vez
description.spanish: Toca una estrella caído por primera vez
description.turkish: İlk kez düşmüş bir yıldıza dokunun

description.english: Meet the Moonling for the first time
description.french: Rencontrer le Moonling pour la première fois
description.german: Treffen Sie den Moonling zum ersten Mal

description.spanish: Cumplir con el Moonling por primera vez
description.turkish: İlk kez Moonling Tanışmak

description.english: Luna and the Moonling both die at the same time
description.french: Luna et Moonling meurent tous les deux en même temps
description.german: Luna und die Moonling sterben beide zur gleichen Zeit
description.italian: Luna e la Moonling entrambi muoiono allo stesso tempo

description.portuguese: Luna eo Moonling ambos morrem ao mesmo tempo
description.spanish: Luna y el Moonling tanto mueren al mismo tiempo
description.turkish: Luna ve Moonling her ikisi de aynı anda kalıp

description.english: The non-controlled character dies

description.portuguese: O personagem não controlado morre
description.spanish: El personaje no controlado muere
description.turkish: kontrollü olmayan karakter ölür

description.english: Unlock the second level page of the Moon Isles quest

description.english: Get the Potion of Light on the final level in the Moon Isles quest

description.turkish: Ay Isles arayışı içinde nihai düzeyde ışığın iksir alın
